title: Two more arrested over Tangalle Cop killing
content: Sri Lanka Police have arrested another suspect in connection to the incident where a Police Officer was beaten to death by a mob of 15 people in Vitharandeniya, Tangalle on the 17th of February 2022.The suspect is a 40-year-old man from Weeraketiya and he was remanded until the 4th of March, said Police.On the 19th of February 2022, four suspects were arrested in connection with the murder of the police constable, and among was the woman who was involved in several altercations with the deceased.
